# Greece Cyclades - AI Travel Assistant for the Cyclades Islands
# https://greececyclades.com

## About This Website
GreeceCyclades.com is the comprehensive travel guide for the Cyclades islands in Greece. 
We provide AI-powered trip planning, hotel search, ferry booking, and detailed guides for all 24 Cyclades islands.

## Core Services
- Touristas AI: AI-powered travel assistant specialized in Cyclades islands
- Trip Planner: Interactive AI trip planning tool at /trip-planner
- Hotels: Search 1,000+ hotels across all Cyclades islands at /hotels
- Ferry Tickets: Book ferry tickets between islands at /ferry-tickets
- Island Guides: Detailed guides for all 24 islands at /guides
- Activities: Discover tours, excursions, and experiences at /activities
- Flights: Find flights to Cyclades airports at /flights
- Car Rental: Rent vehicles for island exploration at /rent-a-car

## Popular Island Guides (High Priority Content)
- Santorini Guide: https://greececyclades.com/guides/santorini

- Folegandros Guide: https://greececyclades.com/guides/folegandros

## All 24 Cyclades Islands
Santorini, Mykonos, Naxos, Paros, Milos, Ios, Sifnos, Andros, Syros, Tinos, 
Folegandros, Amorgos, Serifos, Kythnos, Kea, Antiparos, Koufonisia, Kimolos, 
Anafi, Sikinos, Iraklia, Schinoussa, Donousa, Thirasia

## Content Categories
- Island destination guides with beaches, villages, activities
- Hotel recommendations and booking integration
- Ferry schedules and booking via FerryHopper
- Weather information and best time to visit
- Greek phrases and travel tips
- Budget calculators and planning tools
- Cyclades food and cuisine guides
- Nightlife and entertainment guides

## AI Capabilities (Touristas AI)
Our Touristas AI can:
- Create personalized multi-day itineraries for Cyclades trips
- Recommend hotels based on budget, location, and preferences
- Suggest optimal ferry routes for island hopping
- Provide local restaurant and taverna recommendations
- Answer questions about beaches, activities, and culture
- Help plan honeymoons, family trips, and adventure travel
- Compare islands for different travel styles
- Provide real-time weather and seasonal advice

santorini, mykonos, naxos, paros, milos, sifnos, ios, folegandros
